channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Security review for Microsoft Edge version 120
item.description:
We are pleased to announce the security review for Microsoft Edge, version 120!
We have reviewed the new settings in Microsoft Edge version 120 and determined that there are no additional security settings that require enforcement. The Microsoft Edge version 117 security baseline continues to be our recommended configuration which can be downloaded from the Microsoft Security Compliance Toolkit.
Microsoft Edge version 120 introduced 10 new computer settings and 10 new user settings. We have included a spreadsheet listing the new settings in the release to make it easier for you to find the...
